author: cole.vt
title: MissionDrivenPools Media Competiton
description: ADA holders get info overload choosing from 1000s of SPOs, using dry data + information sources. Should be easy to connect with MDPs.
solution: Launch a competition open to mission driven pools, winners chosen via public vote receive a professional promo video made for them in kind
experience: 15+ years in TV | Documentary Filmmaking, Educators | Video editing | Projects across 4 continents
